requestBody.description:
DESCRIPTION OF QUERY PARAMETERS:

*email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[^_.-]w+([.-]?w+)*(.w{2,3})+$/

*password - string, user password. Must contain min 7, max 32 characters, at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number
Pattern: /(?!s)^[^ ]{7,32}$/

All fields are required!

400.description:
BadRequest

If email is not valid: This email is not valid
If the password is not valid: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter and 1 number or password length must be at least 7 characters long and less than or equal to 32 characters long

requestBody.description:
DESCRIPTION OF QUERY PARAMETERS:

*email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[^_.-]w+([.-]?w+)*(.w{2,3})+$/

*password - string, user password. Must contain min 7, max 32 characters, at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number
Pattern: /(?!s)^[^ ]{7,32}$/

All fields are required!

200.description:
The user is logged in successfully

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:
token - string, the user's bearer token
email - string, the user's email address in object user.

400.description:
BadRequest

If email is not valid: This email is not valid
If the password is not valid: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter and 1 number or password length must be at least 7 characters long and less than or equal to 32 characters long

200.description:
The data was fetched successfully

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

id - string, user id

name - string, the user's name. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, the apostrophe symbol, spaces and hyphens.
pattern /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я' -]+$/

email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[^_.-]w+([.-]?w+)*(.w{2,3})+$/

phone - string, user phone number. Can contain: any number, plus symbol, opening and closing bracket symbols, hyphen (minus) character, space character.Pattern: /^+380d{9}$/

city - string, user city. Must contain min 2, max 100. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, as well as separators in the form of a space or hyphen. At the same time, it does not allow a delimiter string to begin or end and does not allow the use of two delimiters in a row.
Pattern: /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+(?:[s-][a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+)*$/ birthday - date, the user's birthday. max date - now, example format: 1980-04-15T00:00:00.000Z

avatarURL - string, the path to the uploaded user avatar

requestBody.description:
DESCRIPTION OF QUERY PARAMETERS:

avatar - the user's avatar is a photo file no larger than 3Mb

avatar.description: Select a JPEG or PNG image file.

200.description:
Avatar successfully modified

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

avatarURL - string, the path to the uploaded user avatar

avatarURL.description: The URL of the updated avatar image

500.description: Failed to update image in Cloudinary

requestBody.description:

get.summary: Search for notices by category and title

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category of the notices to search for

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query to match against notice titles

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of notices to retrieve per page

200.description:
Successful operation

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

notices - array, with objects notices

_id - string, notice id

title - string, notice title

category - string, notice category, 1 of 3 categorys (sell, lost-found, for-free)

price - string, minimum 1

name - string, required. The pet's name. Must contain min 2, max 16.

birthday - date, required. The pets's birthday, max date - now

breed - string, pet breed. Must contain min 2, max 16.

place - string, format city

sex - string, 1 of 2 (male, female)

comments - string, сomment on the pet. Must contain min 8, max 120.

owner - obgect, user ID, email, phone, who owns the notice

photoURL - string, path to photo

photoPublicId - string, cloudinary photo public id

total - integer, total objects

totalPages - integer, total pages

currentPage - integer, current page

limit - integer, the maximum number of notices to retrieve per page

404.description: There are no notices for this request

requestBody.description:
DESCRIPTION OF QUERY PARAMETERS:

name - string, required. The pet's name. Must contain min 2, max 16.

photo - file, the pet photo is a JPEG or PNG image file, no larger than 3Mb.

birthday - date, required. The pets's birthday, max date - now, example format: 05-10-2022

breed - string, pet breed. Must contain min 2, max 16.

comments - string, сomment on the pet. Must contain min 8, max 120.

All fields are required!

201.description:
Pet added successfully

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

name - string, required. The pet's name. Must contain min 2, max 16.

photoURL - file, the pet photo is a JPEG or PNG image file, no larger than 3Mb.

birthday - date, required. The pets's birthday, max date - now, example format: 05-10-2022

breed - string, pet breed. Must contain min 2, max 16.

comments - string, сomment on the pet. Must contain min 8, max 120.

owner - string, user ID, who owns the pet

_id - string, user id

get.summary: Get the user and his pets

200.description:
The operation is successful!

DESCRIPTION OF RESPONSE PARAMETERS:

user - object with user data

_id - string, user _id

phone - string, user phone number. Can contain: any number, plus symbol, opening and closing bracket symbols, hyphen (minus) character, space character.

name - string, the user's name. Must contain min 2, max 16. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, the apostrophe symbol, spaces and hyphens.
pattern /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я' -]+$/

email - string, the user's email address. Pattern: /^([a-z0-9_-]+.) *[a-z0-9_-]+@[a-z0-9_-]+(.[ a-z0-9_-]+)*. [a-z] {2,6}$/

avatarURL - string, the path to the uploaded user avatar

favorite - array with id favorite notices

birthday - date, the user's birthday. max date - now, example format: 05-10-2022

city - string, user city. Must contain min 2, max 100. It can contain only Latin and Cyrillic letters, as well as separators in the form of a space or hyphen. At the same time, it does not allow a delimiter string to begin or end and does not allow the use of two delimiters in a row.
Pattern: /^[a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+(?:[s-][a-zA-Zа-яА-Я]+)*$/


pets - array of objects with pet data

name - string, required. The pet's name. Must contain min 2, max 16.

photoURL - file, the pet photo is a JPEG or PNG image file, no larger than 3Mb.

birthday - date, required. The pets's birthday, max date - now, example format: 05-10-2022

breed - string, pet breed. Must contain min 2, max 16.

comments - string, сomment on the pet. Must contain min 8, max 120.

owner - string, user ID, who owns the pet

_id - string, user id

example.text: In a city of yawning class inequality, some side hustles let you glimpse how the other half lives.
